ygData.subject: Re: Bards
ygData.msgSnippet: Because the given song is only fully effective with the required instrument. Also, if you use an instrument with a song that doesnt require it, it amplifies
ygData.messageBody:
Because the given song is only fully effective with the required instrument.
Also, if you use an instrument with a song that doesnt require it, it
amplifies the effect of the song: the more difficult the instrument the more
the amplification.
Robbiton, Bard

----Original Message Follows----
From: "Steve Price" <itan@...>
Reply-To: Bristlebane_EQ@onelist.com
To: "Bristlebane EQ Onelist" <Bristlebane_EQ@onelist.com>
Subject: [Bristlebane_EQ] Bards
Date: Fri, 7 May 1999 20:52:56 +0100

From: "Steve Price" <itan@...>

Can someone explain this to me.

If Bard spellsongs have a required skill (such as Percussion), why is it not
actually necessary to have the skill when you use the songs?

Steve
